item.tib: chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
item.skttrans: sarba d+harma ma hA san bo d+hi tsit+ta ku la ya rA dza
item.coloph: rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal gyi seng ge dang/ dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: la zlo gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub sems su 'dus pa'i mdo
item.skttrans: sarba d+harmaHsan+d+hi ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta sU tra

item.tib: bkra shis pa'i dpal
item.skttrans: s+vasti shrIH
item.coloph: bkra shis pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sin+ha dang bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems rtsal chen gyi rgyud
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA pu Sh+Ta tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrU sing+ha sang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'i

item.tib: byang chub sems bsgom pa
item.skttrans: b+ho d+hi tsit+ta sa mA d+hi
item.coloph: rdzogs so

item.tib: byang chub sems rdo rje 'od phro ba'i rgyud kyi rim pa zhes bya ba
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta badzra pra b+ha tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rgyud kyi rgyal po mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan rje btsan dam pa rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i rgyud rdzogs so

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa'i yi ge med pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: rdzogs so// //bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa na dang/ rgya nag gi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+has bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rje btsan dam pa
item.skttrans: tsa ra sha ar+thA
item.coloph: rdzogs so
byang chub kyi sems mi 'gyur ba'i thig le tig rgzogs so

item.tib: srog gi 'khor lo
item.skttrans: a yo tsa kra
item.coloph: srog gi 'khor lo rdzogs so

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems namkha'i rgyal po
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta a Shar+Sha ra dza
item.coloph: byang chub sems namkha'i rgyal po rdzogs so

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems rtse mo byung rgyal
item.skttrans: bo d+he tsit+ta pa tra rA dza ya na
item.coloph: byang chub sems rtse mo byung rgyal zhes bya ba bsam gtan rdzogs so

item.tib: bde 'jam
item.skttrans: many+dzu su kha
item.coloph: bde 'jam rdzogs so

item.tib: bde ba phra bkod
item.skttrans: su kha pra ka te
item.coloph: byang chub sems bde ba phra bkod pa rdzogs so

item.tib: kun 'dus
item.skttrans: sarba a ta
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems kun 'dus rdzogs so
gnams spar 'debs rdzogs so

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i myu gu
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta su kha bin du he tsi
item.coloph: byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i myu gu rdzogs so
rdzogs pa spyi gcod ces bya ba rdzogs so
byang chub kyi sems khams gsum sgron ma rdzogs so

item.tib: byang chub sems bsgom pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta a bA ya tan+t+ra
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud theg pa'i snying po rdzogs so

item.tib: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa namkha' dang mnyam pa yi de med pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sarba d+harmA/ ma hA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la tshe da A kA sha san+ta tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rdzogs so// //bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: chos thams cad byang chub kis sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa rnyog ma med pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sarba d+harmA/ ma hA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mU la tshe d+ha sa mu sa man+ta b+hi la tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rdzogs so// //rgya gar gi mkhan po shri sing ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sarba d+harmaH ma hA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mu la ts+tshed da sU r+ya tsan+d+ra sa ma ta a ma la tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nad gcod pa rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: sarba d+harmaH ma hA san+d+hi bo d+hi tsit+ta saM sa ra mu la ts+tshe da ma ha rat+na sa man+ta a bud pa to tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhhan po shrI sing ha dang/ bos kyi lo ts+tsha bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o// /snga 'gyur lnga dang phyi 'gyur bcu gsum gyi rgyud la rnyi ba'i ban chung nyi ma rdo rjes byas pa

item.tib: ye shes gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: dz+nyA na gu h+ya nA ma tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rdzogs s+ho// //san+d+hi ma hA gu h+ya na ma tan+t+ra/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing ha fang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba pa gor bai ro tsa nas/ yul d+ha he na'i 'dus khang du sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta a ti dz+nyA na san+d+hi tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha sang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas d+ha he na'i 'du khang du bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che man ngag gi rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: dz+nyA na gu h+ya ri bu ma rat+na u pa de sha tan+t+ra bA ma
item.coloph: ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //paN Ti ta shri sing+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas man ngag gi rgyud gtan la phab pa'o

item.tib: rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
item.skttrans: rat+na A r+ya pa tha da ri tan+t+ra nA ma
item.coloph: rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta shrI sing ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
item.note: End of the volume: 'di khams lugs kyi rgyud gsang bsgron ma'i bzhug la bris shig ces pa 'dug

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa' namkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po
item.skttrans: badzra sat+va kha sa mAn+ta ma hA tan+t+ra
item.coloph: namkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la pha pa'o/ /gzhung tshad bam po bcu gcig pa'o

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa' namkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po
item.skttrans: badzra sat+va kha sa mAn+ta ma hA tan+t+ra
item.coloph: byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so// //kha sa mAn+ta chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas d+ha he na'i 'du khang du bgyur ro

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa' namkha' che gsang ba'i snying po rnal ma don gyi rgyud
item.skttrans: badzra gu h+ya gar+b+ha sa t+va ma hA kha b+h+yer+tha tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rdo rje sems dpa' namkha' che snying po rnal ma don gyi rgyud rdzogs so

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa' namkha' che kun tu bzang po gsang ba snying po'i rgyud
item.skttrans: badzra sat+va kha sya mahA/ sa man+ta b+ha dra gu h+ya gar+b+ha tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa' namkha' che bram ze rgyas pa'i rgyud
item.skttrans: badzra sat+va sa ya khe ma hA de ha puSh+TiM ga ra tan+t+ra
item.coloph: bram ze rgyas pa rdzogs so

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa' namkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: rdzogs s+ho

item.tib: rdo rje sems dpa' namkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
item.skttrans: badzra sa t+va ma hA A ka sha puSh+Ta nA ma yo gi nI tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa/ phyis skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos pa'o

item.tib: byang chub sems bsgom pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud
item.coloph: rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang/ bos kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur pa'o

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i rgyud
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta ra tsa nu ha tan+t+ra
item.coloph: rdzogs s+ho// //byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba' phyi ma ta ma nyid dang gsum bzhugs pa las/ zab mo bu ti'i lha khang du bu gnyis lus so/ /slob dpon bu d+d+ha kup+tas snums bar bzhengs nas/ lan gcig gzigs pas/ gnod sbyin kha rtsal gyi 'graxxx du thal lcag gcig rgyab nas brgyal bar gyur to/ brgyal sangs pa dang/ srin po lta bu'i tshul du 'dug pas smras pa/ gnas khang rgyal par gyur pa 'di nyid lyo rgyal po ,e 'od khyod kyi me khyer ro/ /gal te khyer na khyod nyid bsad par bya/ zhes smras pas/ bred nas dngangs nas/ ma ni gong du spyan gzhan zhig tu drangs/ bu gnyis der lus so/ /gang de nyid rnam par 'grel ba la/ /dgos don gsal 'tshad don la 'char ba ni/ /ma bu gsum nas drangs nas gtan la phab/ /phyi nas blo'i zer las skyod nas bya bzod na/ 'phags thugs 'gal dang 'phral du gnod sbyin mos/ /bar chad byed phyir blo'i gzer la skyod/ /las stod mkhas pa mgon po la/ myang stod lce nag bdud rstis zhus

item.tib: bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i le'u
item.skttrans: ma hA su kha/ bo d+hi tsit+ta so pa shi ka
item.coloph: rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha sang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o

item.tib: byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba
item.skttrans: bo d+hi tsit+ta so pa shi ka
